skeleton:
# {{topic}}

[IMAGE: Hero image - a polished screenshot or visual of the project in its best light]

## Overview
[Write a compelling 2-3 sentence overview of what this project is and who it's for. Make it clear and specific.]

## The Problem
[Describe the challenge or pain point this project addresses]
- Why it mattered
- What the stakes were
- Who was affected

[IMAGE: Visual showing the problem - could be a before state, user frustration visualization, or data showing the gap]

## The Approach
[Explain how you tackled the problem]
- Key decisions made
- Technical highlights
- Notable features or innovations

[IMAGE: Architecture diagram, key feature screenshot, or process visualization]

## The Solution
[Walk through what you built]
- Core functionality
- User experience highlights
- Technical implementation notes

[IMAGE: Multiple product screenshots or feature demonstrations]

## The Results
[Share measurable outcomes]
- Key metrics and improvements
- User feedback or testimonials
- Business impact

[IMAGE: Results dashboard, metrics visualization, or testimonial graphic]

## Key Learnings
[Reflect on what worked and what you'd do differently]
- What went well
- Challenges overcome
- Future considerations

## Technologies Used
[List the tech stack with brief notes on why each was chosen]
